content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
     MONTH(order_purchase_date) as month, YEAR(order_purchase_date) as year ,count(order_id) as no_of_orders
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://adlsglobalaayush.dfs.core.windows.net/synapsecontainer/orders (2).csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    GROUP BY YEAR(order_purchase_date),MONTH(order_purchase_date)
